Base:Descriptions.Base:Description: the foyer

The foyer welcomes you into the StoryHost's House. The walls stand tall as stacked, split logs; unadorned yet masterful in their simplicity. Two leather chairs frame the southern door which leads to the porch. A small, glass table stands on each side of the north door that heads deeper into the house. Above the western glass table, an intercom catches your eye. Tall, shaded lamps stand on each table. The western door is crafted from simple, light wood and bears a detailed engraving of leaves, ivy and the words 'VP Closet'. The eastern door was created from a single piece of cedar and shows a deep carving of budding flowers and the words '@builder Closet'. [Access is limited in each direction based on individual roles and staff membership.]
The foyer.

the eastern door
The door to the east was created from a single piece of cedar and shows a deep carving of budding flowers and the words '@Builder Closet'.
The door to the east was created from a single piece of cedar and shows a deep carving of budding flowers and the words '@Builder Closet'.
@Builder Closet
the northern door
The door to the north leads to the living room; flanked by two glass tables bearing shaded lamps. An intercom is installed off to the west side.
The door to the north leads to the living room; flanked by two glass tables bearing shaded lamps. An intercom is installed off to the west side.
the southern door
The dark, wooden door to the south leads to the porch.
The dark, wooden door to the south leads to the porch.
the western door
The door to the west is crafted from simple, light wood and bears a detailed engraving of leaves, ivy and the words 'VP Closet'.
The door to the west is crafted from simple, light wood and bears a detailed engraving of leaves, ivy and the words 'VP Closet'.
VP Closet
eastern chair

The eastern chair has a large roll-back top, a waterfall of button-tufted leather which cascades downwards to a deeply padded seat and then continues in a single graceful curve until it almost hits the floor. The solid maple wood frame is given a handsome walnut finish. The striated-turned legs lend a touch of elegance. The supple, high grade leather is black with dark brown highlights due to its age. It is definitely an antique that has weathered beautifully over the years. A traditional nailhead trim provides the perfect finishing touch to this magnificent leather chair.

small, glass table
A small glass table to the west of the northern door. It has three wrought iron legs curving outward from a circular frame that bears a clear, glass inlay. A shaded lamp stands upon the table.
A small glass table to the west of the northern door. It has three wrought iron legs curving outward from a circular frame that bears a clear, glass inlay. A shaded lamp stands upon the table.
small, glass table

the small, glass tables
Two small glass table flanking the northern door. They have three wrought iron legs curving outward from a circular frame that bears a clear, glass inlay. A shaded lamp stands upon each table.
Two small glass table flanking the northern door. They have three wrought iron legs curving outward from a circular frame that bears a clear, glass inlay. A shaded lamp stands upon each table.
the intercom

The intercom is planted on the north wall, just west of the door. It is a simple brushed metal design bearing a speaker and a single button upon its face. It allows one to converse with those within the house. [Push Button and Evoke. i.e. push button 'Hello, can I get some help?]

The intercom is planted on the north wall, just west of the door. It is a simple brushed metal design bearing a speaker and a single button upon its face. It allows one to converse with those within the house. [Push Button and Evoke. i.e. push button 'Hello, can I get some help?]
western shaded lamp

A shaded lamp standing on the western table. The base of the lamp has been crafted from a wrought iron frame holding cracked pieces of colored glass in the shape of an orb. Extending from the top, a brass post contains the lightbulb covered by a circular, ecru shade. {? greaterthan | $(this.details:lamp_1:luminosity) | 1.0 | The lamp is on. [You may 'turn off' the lamp.] | The lamp is off. [You may 'turn on' the lamp.] }

Core:Properties.Core:Property: X[M] if(sizeof(\$dob) == 1 \&\& NRefDetail(\$dob[0]) == "intercom") \{ Call(\$\{Ironclaw:Lib:Builders:Lib\}, "intercom_system", \$actor: \$actor, \$loc: \$this, \$evoke: \$evoke, \$sys: "backstage" ); \} return TRUE;

X[M] \$bodyname = Describe(\$actor); \$db = \$\{Ironclaw:Lib:Objects:Create\}; \$acct = \$actor."skotos:creator"; \$allow = 0; if(contains(\$bodyname, "Story")) \{ \$allow = 1; \} if(member(\$acct, Arr(\$db.access))) \{ if(\$allow != 1) \{ \$allow = 2; \} \} if(\$allow == 1) \{ return TRUE; \} else if(\$allow == 2 \&\& NRefDetail(\$target) == "exit-east") \{ return TRUE; \} else if(NRefDetail(\$target) == "exit-west") \{ return TRUE; \} else \{ EmitTo(\$actor, "Access to that area is restricted. If you feel this message is erroneous, please @assist. Thank you."); return FALSE; \}

X[M] if(sizeof(\$dob) == 1) \{ if(member(NRefDetail(\$dob[0]), Arr(\$this.islightable))) \{ Call(\$\{Ironclaw:Lib:Builders:Lib\}, "turnoffdetail", \$actor: \$actor, \$det: \$dob[0], \$id: NRefDetail(\$dob[0]), \$loc: \$this ); \} return TRUE; \}

X[M] if(sizeof(\$iob) == 1) \{ if(member(NRefDetail(\$iob[0]), Arr(\$this.islightable))) \{ Call(\$\{Ironclaw:Lib:Builders:Lib\}, "turnondetail", \$actor: \$actor, \$det: \$iob[0], \$id: NRefDetail(\$iob[0]), \$loc: \$this ); \} return TRUE; \}
